entry.title: Enable Win10 taskbar on Win11 24H2 0.1.1
entry.content: Rename and fix readme

entry.title: Enable Classic Theme by handle method 1.0.4
entry.content: Update readme

entry.title: Better file sizes in Explorer details 1.4.1
entry.content:
• Fixed elevated processes being unable to receive folder sizes from Everything, causing a timeout and missing folder sizes.
  • Made the "Use MB/GB for large files" option work for older file dialogs too, for example Regedit's export dialog.

entry.title: Legacy Alt+Tab dialog 1.0.1
entry.content: Add info on supported Windows versions.

entry.title: Better file sizes in Explorer details 1.4
entry.content: • Added an option to mix files and folders when sorting by size.

entry.title: Better file sizes in Explorer details 1.3
entry.content: • The integration with Everything was rewritten and is now faster (about x6 speedup), more stable (occasional hangs were fixed), and more robust overall.

entry.title: Taskbar minimize/restore on scroll 1.0.7
entry.content:
• Fixed all group items minimizing/restoring on scroll even when the group is not combined.
  • Fixed compatibility with the ExtendedUIXamlRefresh Windows feature flag.
  • Fixed thumbnails sometimes being stuck in an inconsistent state when scrolling over them.

entry.title: Better file sizes in Explorer details 1.2.1
entry.content: • Added support for Everything 1.5 alpha.

entry.title: Better file sizes in Explorer details 1.2
entry.content:
• Added an option for getting folder sizes via "Everything" integration, which results in immediate folder sizes without having to calculate them manually.
  • Improved the performance of sorting folders by size.

entry.title: Force Chinese IME Mode 1.0.1
entry.content: Add warning message for force-chinese-ime

entry.title: Custom Shutdown Dialog 1.0.1
entry.content:
• Remove unnecessary version check, as it caused issues on older Explorer versions
  • Refactor code to fit modern Windhawk standards

entry.title: Taskbar auto-hide when maximized 1.1.1
entry.content: • Fixed spanned windows (e.g. Win+right) affecting the sibling monitor taskbar.

entry.title: Taskbar Background Helper 1.0.3
entry.content: • Fixed the mod always thinking there's a maximized window in some cases.

entry.title: Taskbar on top for Windows 11 1.0.5
entry.content: • Fixed an incompatibility with the following mods which could lead to a crash: Taskbar tray icon spacing, Taskbar tray system icon tweaks.

entry.title: Taskbar auto-hide when maximized 1.1
entry.content:
• Most code was rewritten, and the mod works in a slightly different way now - instead of switching auto-hide on and off, it's always left on, but the mod prevents the taskbar from hiding in certain conditions. That has benefits like a smoother transition between the states.
  • The taskbar now auto-hides when a window intersects it. This can be disabled in the options.
  • Auto-hiding can be suppressed altogether in the settings. In this case, maximized windows will be covered by the taskbar. This might be desirable if the taskbar is mostly transparent.

entry.title: Force Chinese IME Mode 1.0
entry.content:
Force Chinese IME Mode | 强制中文输入法

Feature | 功能

This mod forces the Microsoft Pinyin IME to stay in Chinese input mode, preventing unwanted mode switches.
这个 mod 强制微软拼音输入法保持在中文输入模式，防止出现不必要的模式切换。

Before | 使用前

The input mode often switches irregular while using Microsoft Pinyin IME.
使用微软拼音输入法时输入模式经常无规则切换。

After | 使用后

It can ensure that when using the Microsoft Pinyin IME, English will never be entered using the input box.
可以确保在微软拼音输入法的时候，使用输入框永远不会输入英文。

entry.title: Taskbar Background Helper 1.0.2
entry.content:
• Fixed the background not updating in some cases, e.g. when exiting Firefox.
  • Added support for Win+Tab and other fullscreen windows.

entry.title: Start button always on the left 1.2
entry.content:
• Fixed the jumpy animation that occurred when the taskbar is animated.
  • Fixed taskbar items overlapping with the start button when the taskbar is full.
  • Fixed the mod when the "Start menu on the left" option is disabled.

entry.title: Start button always on the left 1.1.2
entry.content: • Fixed the widget overlapping with the start button.

entry.content: • Added an option to show folder sizes too.
